directions.from_staircase: After reaching third floor, turn left to enter S wing. S301 is the first lab on your right.
directions.to_library: Exit S301 and continue straight. S302 (Library) is the next room.

directions.from_s301: Exit S301 and continue straight. S302 is the next room.
directions.to_e_learning: Exit the library and continue straight. S303 (E Learning Studio) is the next room.

directions.from_library: Exit the library and continue straight. S303 is the next room.
directions.to_r_wing: Exit S303 and turn right to enter R wing.

general_directions.s_to_r: Exit S wing and turn right to enter R wing
general_directions.r_to_p: Exit R wing and continue straight to enter P wing
general_directions.p_to_t: Exit P wing and turn right to enter T wing
general_directions.t_to_j: Exit T wing and continue straight to enter J wing
general_directions.j_to_o: Exit J wing and turn left to enter O wing
